dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: Good morning Vincent, why do you look like you are not doing well today?
Do you want to tell her about the conversation between your parents and you in the morning?

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: My mother said her grades were not ideal because I didn't make any progress.

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: In fact, there is still time to sprint for results, so don’t be unhappy! We can learn and work together!

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: you're right! See you in the library this afternoon!

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: I didn't sleep well last night…..
